reviews.title: Very good!

reviews.text: Anita was really helpful taking care to provide detail every step of the way, really focusing on the customer and our requirements. Her advice and friendly approach made the whole process easy and enjoyable

reviews.text: Anita was just fantastic from start to finish for BF above and beyond, understanding my confusions and acknowledging them in a wonderful way! She was a wonderful lady to speak with and I could tell she genuinely cared for me as a customer, ensuring everything was for my best interests! The Monmouthshire Building Society continues to support me 10 years down the line- thank you!

reviews.title: Excellent support from MBS
reviews.text: I have had a mortgage with the Monmouthshire BS for 8 years - both during my working life and after retirement. At all times I have been treated with courtesy and given very helpful service from informed and efficient advisers who have shown considerable understanding of my individual situation (I am now 73) and have successfully matched products to my requirements at different times. I have also consulted independent mortgage advisers and visited mortgage comparison websites. On the last 3 occasions I have returned to the Monmouthshire because of their excellence.

reviews.title: Fast turnaround, great service from Jamie!
reviews.text: I contacted MBS about porting my mortgage on a new property purchase. Jamie Warburton picked up the request, and has been nothing but brilliant ever since. Every step of the journey there more than adequate updates, explanations when they were needed, and other relevant information. I really felt like Jamie was on my side, really pled my case with the underwriters to get the mortgage offer over the line. For a process that has generally been quite stressful in the past, Jamie made it a lot less so, on top of probably a record time turnaround.

reviews.title: Generating funds
reviews.text: I wanted to generate additional funds to invest in my property and thought about additional borrowing. After discussing with their advisor, they came up with a better and more cost efficient method of generating the funds.

reviews.title: Very positive experience with second mortgage
reviews.text: Very positive experience, Jamie took the time to explain everything, was dedicated to our case and ensured we got everything across the line before our deadline.

reviews.title: Be open to advice
reviews.text: As retired Corporate bankers Ian and I thought we knew all that we needed to about mortgages but we were wrong!! Anita was extremely knowledgeable and helpful in explaining why we were able to fix the rate for a longer term than we had expected and the amount we can repay early without penalty. Both of these have resulted in a far better outcome for us than we had hoped for.

reviews.title: Exceptional Service
reviews.text: Anita, who handled our mortgage was exceptional. Knowledgeable, friendly and professional. Could not be better.

reviews.title: Brilliant Mortgage Advisor
reviews.text: Our experience from start to finish couldn’t have been better. Whilst there was a lot of information to go through, our mortgage advisor Anita was always there to answer any questions. Even though we had to go through some difficult questions regarding our finances it never felt like we were being judged, Anita was so professional and supportive which made the whole process as stress free as possible.

reviews.title: Quick and easy.

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.text: Anita Morgan was patient, kind and ensured I had all the information I needed before going ahead. She updated when better offers were available that suited me better and ensured I understood at each step. Many thanks.

reviews.title: You can speak to someone, very friendly reassuring a...
reviews.text: You can speak to someone, very friendly reassuring advisors. Very helpful.

reviews.title: Exceptional Service and Mortgage Advice
reviews.text: Our Mortgage Adviser, Anita, was exceptional throughout. She was extremely helpful, responded in a timely manner and really went the extra mile. She is a credit to the Monmouthshire Building Society. We felt reassured all the way along. Furthermore, Monmouthshire have provided our mortgages for many years and we have found them to be extremely good.

reviews.title: Very helpful, very efficient and very friendly.
reviews.text: Very helpful, very efficient and very friendly. Leon was a pleasure to deal with.

reviews.title: The Monmouthshire Building Society have a 'floor' ra...
reviews.text: The Monmouthshire Building Society have a 'floor' rate on their variable rate products that, at the moment, doesn't go beneath 3.5 %. However they have no ceiling rate, so when the interest rates went up exponentially, there was nothing to protect their members. They therefore design their products to protect themselves alone. Potential customers should also know that for a long time preferential rates were offered to new members at the expense of existing members. Should a mutual building Society behave this way? Their mortgage products are all smoke and mirrors, a maze of early repayment fees, product fees, floor rates, set up so that their members will always be disadvantaged. I read the following today: "Monmouthshire Building Society has today (August 20th) published its financial results for 2024-25. The Newport-based Society has announced a 61% increase in profits for the last financial year, up from £2.3million, to £3.7million, and total assets reaching £1.72bn." Well it's no wonder. There's only ever going to be profits for the building society which plays heads I win, tails you lose. If you're looking for a fair building society which operates for the benefit of its members, don't look at the Monmouthshire.

reviews.title: Leon was really easy to talk to and dealt with my ra...
reviews.text: Leon was really easy to talk to and dealt with my rate switch in a timely and efficient manner.

reviews.title: Mortgage with Monmouthshire Building Society
reviews.text: I had a mortgage with Monmouthshire Building Society which was coming to the end of its term. I spoke with one of your advisers, Leon Jenkins, with regard to finding a new mortgage product. Leon was totally professional in his advice while at the same time being helpful, courteous and polite. He answered all my questions objectively, clearly and with great patience with the result that I felt reassured that I was taking out the best product for me. He made a potentially stressful experience into a very pleasant one. Based on my experience I would be very happy to recommend Monmouthshire Building Society.

reviews.title: Outstanding Mortgage Advice from Claire Oakey
reviews.text: I recently had an appointment with Claire Oakey, and I cannot recommend her highly enough. She was extremely polite, professional, and very patient throughout the whole process. Even though I asked lots of questions and wanted to explore different options, Claire was always accommodating and explained everything clearly. She carefully compared different products, including options with and without fees, discussed reducing the mortgage term, and thoroughly checked my income and outgoings to ensure everything was suitable. I felt completely supported and reassured by her advice. The customer service I received was outstanding — Claire’s knowledge, patience, and professionalism really stood out. Although I had competitive rates from other providers, I chose to stay with Monmouthshire because the service I received from Claire exceeded all others. Highly recommended — thank you, Claire! I’m

reviews.title: Leon, my advisor was excellent and understood my cir...
reviews.text: Leon, my advisor was excellent and understood my circumstances and recommended an appropriable product accordingly

reviews.title: MBS excellent experience
reviews.text: From the first time I got in touch with MBS it has been a very professional excellent service.

reviews.title: Monmouthshire Building Society - Mortgages Review
reviews.text: We have been members of the Society for 6 years, and are now seeking to move, home. Claire, our mortgage advisor has been fantastic, and very efficient. I would say that whilst you might not necessarily get the best rates when compared to other lenders, they are still competitive and provide a far more personal service, which is worth more to us than a percentage point. Overall, I would not hesitate to recommend Monmouthshire Building Society.

reviews.title: Excellent mortgage advice.
reviews.text: Leon has been brilliant from the start - called me when he said he would, responded to emails, sent me the information required, and explained everything with detail & confidence; making an often difficult and stressful process as stress-free as possible. He has responded to my many questions, providing the clarity I needed, and has explained next steps and what’s required of me. Ownership, clear next steps, and timescales, are very important to me in customer service - all of which were provided in a friendly and professional manner! Thank you very much!

reviews.title: Excellent, concise support with attention to detail
reviews.text: Previously had advice from Leon just as Covid lockdown started and when we spoke to him again to remortgage. Both times, he has been calm, concise and has given us excellent and measured advice,

reviews.title: Amazing service and advice given.

reviews.title: Highly recommend!
reviews.text: My experience of raising a mortgage via Adam from the mortgage team (Decision in Principle) and with Pete (Mortgage Adviser) was superb. Pete’s advice was invaluable and the whole process was professional but friendly, and highly efficient and I also benefitted from 2 mortgage rate drops while awaiting completion (long, drawn out chain with my purchase). Prompt service with emails answered quickly and Pete was available at the end of the phone, giving that personal service that is often lacking with other lenders. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a mortgage as my whole experience was 5*

reviews.title: Lack of communication
reviews.text: I requested a decision in principle to take a mortgage out, and after having replied with my availability, I did not hear from the mortgage coordinator again. I think the service was very poor and therefore have decided to go elsewhere.

She explained everything in an easy to understand way, Claire went through the options available to me in a way that it made it easy for me to make my decision and went through the documentation so I understood exactly what was happening, Overall a very pleasant experience.

reviews.text: My mortgage request was dealt with by Anita Morgan followed by Jamie Warburton. They were both extremely helpful and led me through the process with with great clarity. Service was professional and friendly. Thank you for your help.

reviews.title: Excellent service from start to finish
reviews.text: Leon was excellent from start to finish. He was very personable, very informative and went the extra mile to always keep me updated on my application. He was very thorough in everything he did and made sure I completely understood everything before moving to the next step.

reviews.title: Leon has always been amazing.
reviews.text: Leon has always been amazing. He has been my mortgage advisor for over 10 years now. And probably the main reason I have not shopped around! He is very calming and knowledgeable, which has helped when I was inexperienced with mortgages. Keep up the good work!

reviews.title: Mortgage Renewal
reviews.text: Having come to an end of my mortgage term I contacted the society for options. I had previously received advice from Ollie (Taki) 2 years ago when renewing my mortgage switch, so requested to speak with him. Straight away he remembered me, and took time in listening to my needs again. We discussed my options and he gave me all the options available, but most of all he listened to me and understood my needs without giving any hard sell. He was very informative, courteous, knowledgeable, caring to my needs and very professional.

reviews.title: Additional Mortgage
reviews.text: The mortgage advisor Michelle Groves was very good and efficient. We had to wait a few weeks before she could hold the meeting with us. However she had done a very good job in getting all the information and documentation needed prior to the meeting, So we received our mortgage offer within two weeks of the meeting which was excellent.

reviews.text: I found the service provided by Michelle the mortgage advisor to be very knowledgeable and helpful. She was excellent. Appointment took about 1 hour by telephone and she emailed me all documents that I required to complete my new fixed rate on my mortgage.

reviews.title: Further Advance
reviews.text: I worked with Anita Morgan in trying to consolidate my debt and despite the rules of the Society Anita worked so hard and diligently in helping put a case together so that the offer could be supported and underwritten by the society. This was a lengthy process but the approval of the offer has been given and for me and my family this is a huge help in changing our life as we are saving around £2,500 a month with this offer. Without Anita this would have never happened, the funds will be here on 22nd Jan and I will sort the debts and move forwards.

reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.title: MBS Rate Switch
reviews.text: Mortgage advisor Olly proactively called me to query a VM that I had left, a few days prior. He was professional, engaging and arranged my rate switch efficiently and effectively. The MBS website is terrible but thankfully they have professionals like Olly & Adam that more than make up for it.

reviews.title: Our two year mortgage product was coming to an end.
reviews.text: Our two year mortgage product was coming to an end. After speaking with Adam he sent across via email some options of mortgage products and made an appointment for Jamie to call me a few days later to discuss which product we were interested in. I can not fault their friendliness or competence in dealing with me. Moving forward we have another 2 year mortgage deal which we are happy with.

reviews.title: The Truth about the Monmouthshire Building Society
reviews.text: Once upon a time building societies existed to help people in their communities. In the case of the Monmouthshire Building Society this is no longer the case. We have suffered extraordinarily difficult circumstances and they have and still are declining to offer us any meaningful help. Do not trust them. Do not believe their advertisements 'We are a mutual building society run for the benefit of our members'. This could not be further from the truth. Despite many requests they will not even meet us in person, which is a strange way to 'benefit' us. They are not reducing their interest rates as the Bank of England have done because in their words “As a Building Society we can increase or decrease our SVR at any time, and we do not need to follow the movement in the Bank of England Base Rate. This basically means that they can and are quite prepared to ruin their members. They have behaved so badly towards us that it beggars belief. Their complaints procedure is utterly pointless. Despite stating that they agreed with one of our complaints, they still were 'unable to uphold' it for an utterly nonsensical reason which has no correlation to the complaint. The complaints procedure is a box ticking exercise designed solely for them to appear to be fulfilling their obligations. Above all else, remember that the Monmouthshire Building Society are money lenders who, just like all other money lenders, are in it for themselves and themselves alone. They are causing us catastrophic financial ruin which was completely avoidable and the bottom line is they do not care. Even if you are critically vulnerable, they do not care. They should be utterly ashamed of themselves.

reviews.title: Hassle free telephone support
reviews.text: Had several telephone conversations with Joshua Davies regarding possible mortgage Rate Switch options. He clearly explained the alternatives and was very helpful and understanding about our circumstances. Consequently, we completed a swap promptly and with very little effort or hassle on our part.

reviews.text: Ridiculous interest rates, they set their own SVR so high it's eye watering. I was pushed into a deal that's crippling me as they knew I had no other choice. They meant to charge me thousands to move to another deal when they know I can't afford this one anymore. inhave multiple mortgages with multiple companies and not one of them leech from their customers like this. It's disgusting how high they set their rates!

reviews.title: Mortgage renewal - Olly Taki
reviews.text: We've been working with Olly Taki to renew our mortgage and he has been beyond helpful. It's our first renewal, so we didn't know what to expect but he took us through each step and was super patient with our many questions. Mortgage renewals aren't the most enjoyable experience - particularly given the market - but this was arguably the best customer service we've ever received. Thanks Olly!

Being new myself to taking over the mortgage product switch, Leon was patient, extremely knowledgeable and took time to explain my options. Made something l dreaded sorting out a more pleasant experience. Many thanks Leon!

reviews.title: I had a great experience from beginning to end.
reviews.text: I had a great experience from beginning to end. The whole process was quick and easy. Much easier than other lenders I have dealt with in the past. This was mainly due to the mortgage consultant who kept me informed of progress every step of the way and was very approachable. I would thoroughly recommend Monmouthshire to anyone who is thinking of getting a mortgage.

reviews.title: Excellent service experienced from MBS Advisor.
reviews.text: Got in touch to renegotiate my mortgage which ends shortly and promptly arranged telephone appointments for next week. I spoke to Mr Wayne Donovan at the Newport office who was most helpful, polite and courteous. Our conversation was followed up promptly with information on what to expect during my future meeting and relevant information l would require to have at hand. Concise information and excellent information and help from Mr Donovan. 5* service.

reviews.title: Amazing customer service
reviews.text: Michelle has gone above and beyond and I can't thank her enough for all her help! Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: I really like how much you value your customers.
reviews.text: I really like how much you value your customers. Michelle gave me excellent advice - thank you. I do find your online system slow and difficult to use. For example, if I transfer savings it can take days to show on my account whereas with other saving accounts you can instantly access and transfer money and see it in real time.

reviews.title: Olly was very clear and very helpful with all our ne...
reviews.text: Olly was very clear and very helpful with all our needs

reviews.title: Having a single point of contact
reviews.text: i like the fact i dealt with one person throughout the renewal of my mortgage; that person (Michelle) gave excellent advice and took time to understand my circumstances and advise on the relevant products

reviews.title: Absolutely unacceptable!
reviews.text: Absolutely unacceptable! I arranged a call with a mortgage advisor, clearly stating my overseas location and need for a phone number for the appointment. The call handler acknowledged this, yet the mortgage advisor didn't bother to respond to any of my emails, completely wasting my time. This lack of professionalism is utterly disappointing. They should have at least had the courtesy to acknowledge my emails. Don't bother with these so-called professionals.

reviews.title: Thanks to Leon, we were able to get a mortgage for o...
reviews.text: Thanks to Leon, we were able to get a mortgage for our new home after being let down on three occasions by a mortgage broker. Leon was professional, explained the process clearly and supported us during the application process. I wish we did a mortgage application weeks ago to save the drama!

reviews.title: Happy customer once again
reviews.text: Excellent service by Leon Jenkins from start to finish. Leon saved the day yet again, securing a mortgage for our new home. We have been with the Monmouthshire for 9 years and have always received the best, personalised service. Leon is a real asset to the company!

reviews.title: Olly Taki has been awesome.
reviews.text: Olly Taki has been awesome. Really hone out his way to understand us as customers and what is important to us whilst being a subject matter expert at the same time. Amazing service during what has been a tough few months. Thanks Olly. BIANCA & MAT

reviews.title: Excellent value & service from Monmouthshire mortgages
reviews.text: Monmouthshire have over numerous years now consistently provided us with excellent value Mortgages and always with staff who are all very helpful and friendly. Many thanks to Mortgage advisor Jamie Warburton for the professional, friendly and efficient service he has also provided, in arranging our follow on mortgage. Very impressed with Monmouthshire Building Society overall- thankyou!

reviews.title: Not having mortgaged a holiday let before we were re...
reviews.text: Not having mortgaged a holiday let before we were recommended Monmouthshire as a possibility. I dealt exclusively with a gentleman called Leon Jenkins and from the very start his service was impeccable. Very kind, took his time, quite funny, whilst also being incredibly thorough and realistic. Put us at ease and never made us feel awkward for asking questions. Cannot praise him highly enough. He has made the whole process smooth and calm.

reviews.title: Great customer service and clear guidance.
reviews.text: Great customer service and clear guidance. Oliver Taki has been absolutely brilliant. So efficient but friendly and helpful.

reviews.title: An excellent advisor.
reviews.text: Anita had been friendly, approachable, professional and knowledgeable throughout the process.

reviews.title: I cannot thank Oliver Taki enough for helping me to...
reviews.text: I cannot thank Oliver Taki enough for helping me to get through my first home purchase, he has been nothing short of a hero ! Thank-you

reviews.title: Mortgage renewal
reviews.text: Spoke with Wayne Donovan about my mortgage renewal quote and he was very helpful with all the queries I had.

reviews.title: Mortgage acceptance
reviews.text: Our mortgage advisor was very professional, polite, explained things in detail and advised us well on the various options.

reviews.title: Joshua explained the process clearly and succinctly
reviews.text: Joshua explained the process clearly and succinctly, he explored different options in regard to fixed deals and variable deals. He was prompt with responses and checked out with me throughout to ensure understanding.

reviews.title: Hristina Winstanley was a top class mortgage advisor.
reviews.text: Hristina Winstanley was a top class mortgage advisor. I enquired on the website she rang immediately in the morning after, accessed my account without fuss and then offered me an appointment within 24 hours and then completed my remortgage the next day. World class service, many thanks

reviews.title: Olly is the best!!
reviews.text: We had Olly for our mortgage advice call and he was incredible! Turned a pretty dull subject into an uplifting and exciting conversation with lots of laughs whilst also providing relevant amount of information tailored to our needs. Olly managed to keep up his momentum on a 2.5 hour call which must be incredibly difficult when providing such an extensive amount of information. Thanks for all your help Olly!

reviews.title: I really rate Monmouthshire Building Society.
reviews.text: I really rate Monmouthshire Building Society. they are straightforward, friendly and helpful to deal with, a recent queries dealt with by Shawna was a great example. She took the time to listen to and understand my query and then she was very knowledgeable in answering the query - great service.

reviews.title: phenomenal support & staff
reviews.text: From day one of being with Monmouthshire they have been nothing but phenomenal with myself and my husband they have helped in many ways and always given us the best outcome and taken so much stress and turned it all into positives.

reviews.title: Have recently purchased a new property and went thro...
reviews.text: Have recently purchased a new property and went through Leon Jenkins again, as we have used Leon for our last few transactions, and yet again he has been brilliant, took time to understand our needs and helped us with making informed choices. He is patient, helpful and clear with his communication.

reviews.title: Good Good
reviews.text: Good review helpful information xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

reviews.title: I Cant explain in words how fantastic Danielle was !
reviews.text: I Cant explain in words how fantastic Danielle was !!!!

reviews.title: Amazing Anita
reviews.text: I feel so lucky to have had Anita's guidance and support throughout the rate switch/ remortgage process. She went above and beyond and was extremely generous with her time to ensure the product met my needs. Thank you!

reviews.title: I had a truly exceptional experience with Monmouthsh...
reviews.text: I had a truly exceptional experience with Monmouthshire, specifically the outstanding customer care provided by Oliver Taki in the mortgages team. Oliver demonstrated a remarkable level of professionalism, friendliness, efficiency, and speed in every interaction, setting a standard that exceeded my expectations. While my experience with Oliver was stellar, I did find the underwriting process more challenging compared to anecdotes I had heard from friends and family who had chosen different mortgage providers. While the difficulties with underwriting will influence my decision on whether to choose Monmouthshire again in the future, I must underscore that the positive impact of Oliver Taki's exceptional customer care which made my overall journey with Monmouthshire worthwhile.

reviews.title: Oli was extremely professional, friendly and helpful
reviews.text: Oli was extremely professional, friendly and helpful

reviews.title: Mortgage Fix Expiry
reviews.text: Met with Oliver Taki to look at options for mortgage where fixed rate comes to an end in early March. Oliver was professional, courteous and patient throughout and we are very happy with the outcome, both in terms of repayment, term and flexibility. A very easy recommend, thank you.

reviews.title: Olly Fantastic Mortgage Advisor
reviews.text: Olly is a brilliant advisor, he coped with my many changing requirements, thoroughly presenting all the options and assisting throughout the process. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Great experiance - Oliver Taki very helpful
reviews.text: Great experiance - Oliver Taki very helpful

reviews.title: Leon was very good, friendly and informative, happy...
reviews.text: Leon was very good, friendly and informative, happy with the service overall never felt too overwhelming at all, would definitely recommend to other people

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text: Excellent and efficient service when renewing my mortgage to a new rate. My advisor Hristina gave clear and helpful information.

reviews.title: Peter Gomersall / Fixed Rate Mortgage Expiry
reviews.text: Have been discussing fixed rate expiry due in March 2024. Pete has been extremely helpful, professional and patient throughout. Meeting now arranged in mid January. Thanks. An easy recommend.

reviews.title: Review
reviews.text: Monmouthshire are an amazing company and have helped me immensely

reviews.title: Excellent professional service
reviews.text: Very friendly, efficient and professional service. Anita was superb, very thorough a credit to the Society.

reviews.title: 10/10 for Danielle E
reviews.text: If you are lucky enough to be allocated Danielle as your mortgage advisor, you will not be disappointed. Danielle was knowledgeable, professional and went above and beyond to discuss all options with me at my appointment. Cannot recommend her highly enough!

reviews.title: Very happy!
reviews.text: I wanted to get some advice on additional borrowing having already had an existing mortgage. I was contacted by Danielle and she fully explained my options which enabled me to make an informed decision. I found the application process straight forward and Danielle kept me informed about each stage of the application. I am very happy with the service and support I received.

reviews.title: Joshua Davies
reviews.text: Ref: Joshua Davies I have just completed my remortgage with Monmouthshire Bank and wanted to give you some feedback regarding Joshua Davies. I have had around 5 conversations with Joshua regarding my remortgage application. From the first call through every call, he has been professional, reliable and has always put his best foot forward. I've worked at Lloyds Banking Group and with several financial organisations over the last 10 - 20 years. I have also dealt with a lot of mortgage applications and banking matters, and I just wanted to let you know that he has been an absolute pleasure to deal with and I think he's a real asset to your organisation. I can't recommend him highly enough. Many thanks, Robbie Mair

reviews.title: Oliver Taki - most helpful mortgage advisor
reviews.text: Oliver Taki of the cardiff branch was absolutely amazing, he couldn’t have worked any harder for me to obtain my new mortgage. Even with some unfortunate minor credit issues which would normally stop someone from getting a mortgage, this gentleman went above and beyond to help me get my new house. Great customer service by MONBS. Second time I’ve used these for my mortgages across two different houses and always had the best experience

reviews.title: Helpful, Polite and Professional
reviews.text: Easy to deal with, don't waste time making false promises on what they can and can't do, professional but friendly.

reviews.title: Quick and simple remortgage
reviews.text: I recently remortgaged and chose Monmouthshire for the great rate but also the recommendation from a friend about their service. It was so quick and easy to remortgage with them. Really happy!

reviews.title: Great service, great people, great product
reviews.text: Would highly recommend! MBS helped us in 2018 to buy our new home and they made the process clear and easy, have recommended them to lots of friends

reviews.title: Straightforward and speedy
reviews.text: Smooth process, kept updated, information given in easy to understand format.

reviews.title: really friendly service
reviews.text: My husband and I had been on a interest only mortgage for some time and were looking to switch to a repayment mortgage. As new home owners our mortgage knowledge was limited. MBS helped us understand the products available, and placed no pressure on us to borrow with them. They made me feel valued and not just a number.

reviews.title: Superb service
reviews.text: Superb service from MBS and ability to help in areas that not all mainstream lenders can!

reviews.title: Excellent service!
reviews.text: The process of applying and obtaining my mortgage was super efficient and the personal service was great!

reviews.title: Mighty Monmouthshire
reviews.text: At the bottom of the Financial Crisis, the Monmouthshire mortgaged us, when seemingly no-one else would. Seven years later, we still get great rates and great customer service. I've already recommended them, and I would again.

reviews.title: Great Building Society
reviews.text: Great communication, compatible rates.

reviews.title: Trusted
reviews.text: Very professional and available mortgages are outstanding. I'm very pleased to be a customer.

reviews.title: Excellent building society for mortgages
reviews.text: Have provided me with an excellent mortgage service for a property which has an annex when most other lenders would not.

reviews.title: High Praise
reviews.text: We are very very happy with our experience with M.B.S

reviews.title: Always a smile
reviews.text: When I thought about taking on a small mortgage and approached the Monmouthshire the response was very tempting. However the need for it passed, thankfully, but I would have had no hesitation in using the product.

reviews.title: I love my new home!!
reviews.text: It was straightforward to get my mortgage and it was a great deal for a first time buyer. Thank you!

reviews.title: Outstanding Rates and Service!
reviews.text: Monmouthshire offered me the cheapest rate on the market & made my switch from my previous provider simple & pain free. Customer Services experiences since have been hassle free & well trained staff deal with any queries promptly & efficiently. I am so glad I made the switch & highly recommended Monmouthshire.

reviews.title: Low mortgage rates and excellent service.
reviews.text: I am a retired teacher on a limited income. Monmouthshire have provided me with the mortgage I need at rates I can afford, and been happy to renegotiate rates and renew my mortgage as the allotted low interest period expired. I would recommend their services without hesitation.

reviews.title: Competitive mortgage products
reviews.text: At the end of our fixed rate period, Monmouthshire offered a further extension with a competitive rate and the switching process was very simple.

reviews.title: My Awesome Mortgage
reviews.text: I am 53 years old and I thought I would not get another decent mortgage for a new home. But I got an amazing mortgage from Monmouth, who gave me the opportunity to buy a four bedroom bungalow at a very competitive rate! I am so happy - words escape me. Dr SW Howells

reviews.title: 1st Class Service
reviews.text: When we were looking for a mortgage for our new home the Monmouthshire were fantastic,

reviews.title: Approachable and friendly
reviews.text: Monmouthshire have helped me with my current mortgage, giving me honest advice which has kept our finances manageable. Recently spoke with a mortgage advise over the phone, with a query and was really happy with the information I received, and the promptness of the call.

reviews.title: Great company to have as our mortgage provider
reviews.text: We have been with Monthouthshire for years and they have always been helpful, supportive and informative with all of their products. We will definatley recommend them to others.

reviews.title: Great Local Bank
reviews.text: I prefer to work with local companies and Monmouthshire are an example of a great local company who are part of the community.

reviews.title: Friendly, prompt and very helpful
reviews.text: Monmouthshire Building Society have been great ever since application. They have been friendly, prompt in their responses, and very helpful when I've needed information or assistance.

reviews.title: Best rates by far
reviews.text: So happy with our mortgage, we saved over £70 per month over five years. Very helpful and friendly staff too

reviews.title: Best Buy to Let
reviews.text: Best buy to let rates around easy to apply and complete, no fees.

reviews.title: Most competitive mortgage provider for our requirements!
reviews.text: Competitive rates based on our requirements. Couple that with good customer service and the Monmouthshire Building Society gets my vote.

reviews.title: Excellent mortgage advisors
reviews.text: They are friendly, professional and very thorough in their work. Thank you for looking after us.

reviews.title: 1st class service
reviews.text: Such a personal, caring experience with a mortgage advisor who really provided so much more than just selling a product.

reviews.title: Excellent mortgage
reviews.text: Recommended by my mortgage adviser easier to deal with good rates. No problems so far quick and simple to sort.

reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous!
reviews.text: Great to have such a service om my doorstep. I don't think i would be in the property i have now without their products and support.

reviews.title: quality service
reviews.text: I have dealt with the Monmouthshire twice for mortgages and they have been very helpful and professional. I had very good products with staff that made the whole experience personal and not overwhelming.

reviews.title: EXCELLENT Service always
reviews.text: Had a mortgage in 1963 and paid up before time .

reviews.title: Efficient service
reviews.text: Lincolnshire Building Society approached us to see if there was a better deal they could offer. I was dealt with extremely efficiently over the phone with the result that the term of our mortgage was reduced. I would happily recommend to all our friends and family

reviews.title: Best Service and Provider of Specialist Mortgages
reviews.text: From beginning to end I received excellent customer service when applying for a mortgage. At all times the Monmouthshire Building Society were helpful and courteous, listening to my needs and ensuring that I got the best mortgage deal.

reviews.title: Personalised service
reviews.text: We applied for a Holiday Let Mortgage 3 years ago. There are very few providers. I was impressed then by the personal feel of the service I got and the fact that i didn't need to be passed around to anonymous teams for a decision in principle and got follow up from the same contact (Adviser) all the way through. Last year I had a complaint regarding timing of a renewal notice and it was handled well and very fairly. I would definitely recommend them for this product and would consider others from them

reviews.title: No issues. Good competitive rates
reviews.text: Easy to renew. Good prices. Fully informed with plenty of notice when it's time for renewal. Only thing I can say that needs improvement is the ease of use of the online accounts.

reviews.title: Would recommend
reviews.text: Friendly, professional staff, great deal.

reviews.title: Great Communication
reviews.text: Application process great, single point of contact who was able to deal with underwriters quickly.

reviews.title: Great customer service and locally focused company
reviews.text: We took a mortgage out with the Monmouthshire 7 years ago. We would not hesitate to recommend them as we have always found them to be friendly, helpful, efficient and very straightfoward to deal with. We later had to remortgage when we needed to rennovate the same property, and their mortgage adviser was great - we felt listened to, and they were able to help us. We've had a much better experience with them than the bigger companies (no hidden charges etc). One thing to note - our independent mortgage broker initially overlooked them as they didn't realise we were in their 'catchment' area - so worth asking for them if you live in the Forest of Dean/Monmouthshire area.

reviews.title: Best Mortgage
reviews.text: Easy to understand and far beats other products. Very pleased.

reviews.title: A great mortgage provider
reviews.text: We were not just a number a great experience end to end with both our mortgage advisor and underwriter just a phone call away. My husband is self employed and a common sense approach used. Can highly recommend

reviews.title: Great products and great people
reviews.text: We have just arranged our 3rd mortgage with the Monmouthshire and each time it has been a great product but the most important thing to us is having professional knowledgeable people at the end of the phone. I don’t think we will ever use anyone else!

reviews.title: outstanding
reviews.text: Outstanding mortage lender dont only consider young borrowers but have time for the older person.

reviews.title: Reasonable saving rate
reviews.text: Over the past few years the Monmouthshire has had some reasonable saving rates

reviews.title: Amazing service for a first time buyer.
reviews.text: Great understanding of products and detailed information regarding the mortgage and the process. Easy to contact and very helpful customer service department.

reviews.title: Friendly
reviews.text: Make obtaining a mortgage easy and simple ,explaining everything in easy to understand language

reviews.title: Remorgage
reviews.text: Given different options available with explanation. Allowed time to think about and follow up. Best rates available in the market.

reviews.title: Granted a mortgage later in life
reviews.text: Our financial advisor suggested my wife and apply for a mortgage from the Monmouthshire Building Society, even though we were in our 60s. The application was straightforward enough but what really made a difference was that we felt that a real person had assessed our application rather than just putting our details into a YES/NO algorithm! All our contacts with the MBS over the last six years, including renegotiating the mortgage every two years, has been at a 'person-to-person' level. Great service from a small, caring 'bank'. Thank you MBS.

reviews.title: Faultless service.
reviews.text: Great staff; pleasant knowledgeable and helpful. Kept my mortgage with them, as they provided the best service and up to date deals.

reviews.title: Fantastic company
reviews.text: Been with Monmouthshire Building Society for the last five years with our mortgage and they have made the experience of getting a mortgage an easy process. They are very professional and me and my husband cannot fault their services- would recommend to everyone.

reviews.title: First time buyer
reviews.text: They were very easy to deal with and set up our first mortgage, would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Efficient and trustworthy
reviews.text: As older people we applied for a mortgage and were delighted with the integrity of the service, the offer itself and the subsequent follow-up.

reviews.title: Competitive and responsive
reviews.text: Great mortgage provider who is both competitive in the market place and responsive to customer needs

reviews.title: The Company was extremely efficient in arranging our mortgage.
reviews.text: The Company was very quick to respond and were easy to deal with. We highly recommend them to friends and family.

reviews.title: Mortgage
reviews.text: Good interest rate, no problems.

reviews.title: Excellent company
reviews.text: I have been with the Monmouthshire for many years now and would recommend them for a mortgage.

reviews.title: best mortage Providers I have delt with
reviews.text: They made it easy and with great rates. Ive kept my mortage with them for a second time as cant beat the rates or the customer service. The service I have had has been brillant. Ive recommended them to everyone I know who is looking for a mortgage or renewing. They just prove it doent need to be a nightmare renewing or sorting out a mortgage.

reviews.title: Monmouthshire building society
reviews.text: A wonderful pleasant firm to deal with. Thank you for helping us purchase our wonderful family home

reviews.title: Great mortgage & service
reviews.text: It was easy and quick to sort our mortgage and everytime we've had a question the customer service has been amazing. So glad we chose Monmouthshire to be our mortgage provider.

reviews.title: Excellent bespoke mortgage
reviews.text: Monmouthshire considered our height ltv requirements where other providers wouldn’t. We came away with an extremely competitive rate and the house we always wanted. Thanks Monmouthshire!

reviews.title: Perfect Service Every Time
reviews.text: I went to the Cwmbran branch of MBS 6 years ago as a first time buyer, the lady who arranged our mortgage was so helpful and explained everything beautifully, we took out a 3 year fixed and when it came time we went back to renew it and with the help of the advisor ended up taking 7 years off our mortgage and signing up for another 5 year fixed, the service is always amazing which is why we also have our savings there and we’ve just added a new member to our family so we’ve opened him a young saver too!

reviews.title: Best mortgage
reviews.text: Being older other big building societies were less flexible on the age that they will lend till. Monmouthshire have accepted that older customers are valuable.

reviews.title: Superb Service
reviews.text: So easy to manage and work with these guys

reviews.title: Great family ferl
reviews.text: Been with the Monmouthshire mortgage family for 14 years, and I wouldn’t go anywhere else. A personal touch in branch makes all the difference.

reviews.title: Friendly efficient service.
reviews.text: All my visits to my local branch in Monmouth have been met with a friendly and efficient service and there are no queues!!!

reviews.title: Brill
reviews.text: Fantastic service, very friendly staff, nothing too much trouble

reviews.title: Good mortgage easy communication
reviews.text: Got a mortgage through very smoothly and always quick to respond to questions

reviews.title: Excellent building society
reviews.text: So easy to contact and speak to someone about an application.Always had clear step by step information and decisions without having to contact them constantly.My and my husbands experience was always pretty straightforward,resulting in a step by step calm process without the usual frustrations!

reviews.title: Good service every time.
reviews.text: Twenty years with Mon BS. Many mortgage changes and NEVER any issues or problems.

reviews.title: Poor contact centre
reviews.text: When I was moving home they did not help service a new mortgage. I needed. Mortgage offer to know the new mortgage amounts. They couldn't book me in for 2 weeks, so the house I wanted would've gone. I was able to get hold of multiple other mortgage providers instantly and perform an instant quote, yet Monmouthshire, who I was already with, couldn't give me a quote for over 2 weeks and then eventually I had a much cheaper offer elsewhere. Poor customer service

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: I recommend Monmouthshire building society to every person I can. With their help I was able to buy first house at 22, which is not an easy feat in the current housing market. Very impressed with the service and remortgaged again with them 2 years ago, it was very quick and simple to do

reviews.title: Will remain loyal to Monmouth in return for great service.
reviews.text: My dealings with Monmouth have always been stress free, timely and wholly appropriate.

reviews.title: Great value mortgage
reviews.text: Monmouthshire b. s. Contacted me and put me on a cheaper 2 year deal.

reviews.title: Best mortgage provider - Monmouthshire
reviews.text: We have had our mortgage with the Monmouthshire for a number of years. They have been flexible as we’ve added to the loan or reduced it, and as we’ve altered the borrowing length as our needs have changed. They have been easy to talk to despite our living quite away from the nearest branch, and the interest rates have always been competitive. I would recommend the Monmouthshire Building Society to anyone looking for services they provide.

reviews.title: Fantastic mortgage provider
reviews.text: Very helpful throughout the mortgage process from start to finish

reviews.title: Easy to talk too
reviews.text: Everytime I call or go into the branch the staff are so easy to talk too and they explain and help me everytime that's why I keep coming back

reviews.title: Simple and Friendly
reviews.text: Wonderful people who want to help, and with incredible prices and offers that made getting our mortgage worthwhile and easy.

reviews.title: Made our move easier
reviews.text: I am disabled and my husband and I needed to move house Sony parents could move I with us to care for me whilst he was away. Therefore between us we were selling 2 houses and putting all the money into one. Our mortgage advisor was excellent throughout the process and gave us some very helpful advise. He was there whenever we needed to speak to him and he made the whole process so much easier. The bank gave us a great deal as we were already customers so all in all it was a calm and clear process with no problems whatsoever even though we had an unusual request. Highly recommend them.

reviews.title: First time buyer's dream
reviews.text: My husband and I were able to realise out dream or buying our first home with the help of Monmouthshire building society. We always hear how difficult the process can be when buying a home, but the advisors at MBS made it simple and hassle free. From viewing to moving in, it took approx 3 months. The paperwork was easy to read, and I didn't feel bamboozled by jargon. All enquiries were dealt with swiftly and efficiently. Thank you MBS for helping us buy our first home, we are over the moon!

reviews.title: Best provider with mortgage
reviews.text: Transparency and clean rules for the mortgage.

reviews.title: Fast simple service
reviews.text: We applied for a mortgage with them as we was first time buyers we found there system fair and simple and a fast process

reviews.title: They stand a loan
reviews.text: Friendly and efficient to deal with, they offer the personal touch and treat each application on its merits.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: We struggled to get a mortgage for our first house until Monmouthshire accepted us, we’re forever grateful

reviews.title: Fantastic service
reviews.text: We took out a holiday let mortgage and the service we received - particularly from Marli - was first class!

reviews.title: no hassle mortage
reviews.text: couldnt be easier. fully recommend the Monmouthshire

reviews.title: Great, friendly Building Society
reviews.text: A good small building society offering very competitive rates and great customer service.

reviews.title: Good deals and friendly professional service
reviews.text: I have a couple of mortgages with the Monmouthshire. They are easy to deal with and at the end of my rate I was delighted that they extended a new rate that was as good for me as to new customers. I've been really impressed by the good service that they offer.

reviews.title: Fantastic products and service
reviews.text: I've had a great service and competitive mortgage products through the Monmouthshire Building Society for over 20 years. They have always given me a professional and friendly service. Have always and will always continue to recommend them.

reviews.title: Brilliant Service
reviews.text: Portishead branch has the friendliest staff. Really helpful with savings advice

reviews.title: Outstanding lender for local people
reviews.text: Monmouthshire Building Society continues to offer extremely competitive mortgage deals and re-mortgaging is the most simple and hassle-free experience. I recommend Monmouthshire to all my friends and colleagues. No need to look any further for a great deal.

reviews.title: Flexible approach, fast and efficient service and friendly/courteous staff.
reviews.text: I am recently retired and wanted a second mortgage as a future investment and to allow me to purchase a new property and rent out my other property. The Monmouthshire were the most flexible and accommodating company and a pleasure to deal with.

reviews.title: Very Effecient and contactable
reviews.text: Recently in fortunate position to redeem my mortgage. Made contact by phone and then emailed received as promised. Redemption figure sent to me late evening same day. Repayment made as agreed. Would use and recommend

reviews.title: Excellent in all areas.
reviews.text: Customer care has always been of the highest level.

reviews.title: Great value mortgages and excellent customer servive
reviews.text: We were able to get a very competitive rate for a lending in retirement mortgage up to the age of 85 which perfectly suited our needs. Most, if not all, other mortgages were either at significantly higher rates or, if not, did not lend past the age of 80.

reviews.title: Most helpful building society I've dealt with
reviews.text: Brilliant customer service team and the mortgage advisors couldn't have been more helpful.

reviews.title: I'd put my house on them
reviews.text: They really helped me with my mortage as a first time buyer and got my daughter and I the home we wanted. Really helped set up our dreams, I hope they win it's well deserved.

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text: On my second mortgage with Monmouthshire Building Society now and on both occasions its been a pleasure to deal with them even with different advisors.

reviews.title: A dream come true
reviews.text: Monmouthshire have been no less than outstanding for me as a customer. They are always very helpful and have helped me to save money on my mortgage payments. The process of set up was so easy and its just as easy to get through to somebody should you need any help. Thank you all!
